title: [BUG] wrong color displayed
body:
**Description**
Thank you for building this maui plugin!
My animation is showing, but it is the wrong color.
It is displayed in blue on my Maui app (windows), but it should be pink.
When I check my file by uploading the animation to lottiefiles.com I can see it in pink.

The original was blue (https://lottiefiles.com/97952-loading-anim
[loading4pink.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp.Extended/files/11687244/loading4pink.zip)
ation-blue), but I downloaded it with my own custom color.

What could cause this? An unsupported effect used to re-color the animation?
I added my downloaded version (with the pink color)  as a zip (cant upload .json)
